section.title: _Camp_PlaceableObjectBase/CampTent
section.para: This script controls all tent behavior. Attach this script to an Activator which will serve as the player's bed roll. Attaching this script and filling out properties in the Creation Kit is how new tents are created; please see the tutorials for more information. Only 3 properties are required in order for the tent to function, with the rest optional. This script supports creating a tent with a single bed roll, a lantern, clutter, and more. See CampTentEx for even more capability.

section.title: CampTent/Setting_BedRollScale
section.para: Optional: The scale to render the player's and follower's bed rolls. 1.0 by default. }

section.title: CampTent/Setting_BedRollScale
section.para: Optional: The compass direction adjustment applied to the player's sitting position. 0.0 by default. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ShelterModel
section.para: Optional: The tent static object. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ShelterModelExterior
section.para: Optional: The tent static object exterior (for use with Toggle View feature). }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ShelterModelMaterialSnow
section.para: Optional: The tent (ShelterModel or ShelterModelExterior) with snow directional shader applied. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ShelterModelMaterialAsh
section.para: Optional: The tent (ShelterModel or ShelterModelExterior) with ash directional shader applied (use _Camp_AshMaterialSolstheim1P_2 instead of a direct dependency on Dragonborn.esm) }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ClutterStatic1
section.para: Optional: A static to place in or around the tent. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ClutterStatic2
section.para: Optional: A static to place in or around the tent. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ClutterStatic3
section.para: Optional: A static to place in or around the tent. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ClutterStatic4
section.para: Optional: A static to place in or around the tent. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ClutterStatic5
section.para: Optional: A static to place in or around the tent. }

section.title: CampTent/TentAsset_ShelterDestructionCollider
section.para: Optional: Activator that passes its OnHit data to this object. Used to allow hitting the shelter object to destroy the tent. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_FrontExitMarker
section.para: Optional: Position reference of marker to move the player to when exiting a small tent. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_AnimalLayDownMarker
section.para: Optional: Position reference of marker that animals will lie down at. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Shelter
section.para: Optional: The shelter (tent, structure) position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Ward
section.para: Optional: The ward position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Lantern1
section.para: Optional: The first lantern's position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_ClutterStatic1
section.para: Optional: Clutter position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_ClutterStatic2
section.para: Optional: Clutter position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_ClutterStatic3
section.para: Optional: Clutter position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_ClutterStatic4
section.para: Optional: Clutter position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_ClutterStatic5
section.para: Optional: Clutter position reference. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_Backpack
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's backpack. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_Shield
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's shield. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_ShieldInterior
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's shield when in an interior (usually lying flat). }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_WeaponMainHand
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's main hand weapon. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_WeaponOffHand
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's off hand weapon. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_WeaponTwoHand
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's two-handed weapon. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_WeaponBow
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's bow. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_ArmorHelm
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's head gear. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_ArmorCuirass
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's body gear. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_ArmorGauntlets
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's hand gear. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_Player_ArmorBoots
section.para: Optional: Position reference of player's foot gear. }

section.title: CampTent/PositionRef_CenterObjectOverride
section.para: Optional: Set this to specify a different object as the one which all other tent objects "orbit" when rotated. Uses the Shelter or Player Bed if left blank. }
